item.description:
Theme: Judging Pinot's
o Details TBD o Wine Trivia
Thanks to this months Wine Buying Group - Chuck, Joan and Pam. ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
The final wine cost is not finished but an estimate is $12 or $13 /person. **Please bring $10 plus several $1 bills. **
Thanks, Mike --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
From: Kim Johnson To: Mike Blake Sent: Tue, August 3, 2010 9:42:56 AM
Subject: Re: [wine-484] AWS August 19th Meeting - Wine Change
My Address is 76 Lincoln Ln, North Grafton and I included directions below from the MA Pike and from Rte 146 (coming from the south).
Directions to Kim's house
From MA Pike - Exit 11 (Worcester Millbury)
Take right @ light on to Rte 122 South
Go about .6 miles then take right on to Brigham Hill Rd.
Take right at stop sign on to Deernolm St (no street sign)
Take first left on to Lordvale Blvd; this is directly after a MA Pike overpass bridge.
Take 2nd left on to Lincoln Lane; intersection at top of the hill (after 4-way stop).
Take a left after entering the new Lincoln Lane section of the complex. Note: there is a left turn before entering the newer section but it is not well marked and goes to the older complex; some people see it, some do not.
My unit is at the right end of the building (when facing it), closest to the new construction, #76.
From Rte 146 coming from the south â€“ Exit 8 (W Main St/Millbury)
Turn right at the end of ramp - Elm St
Go through 2 sets of lights then turn left at CVS on to Canal St (bridge is out, so you must go left)
Take left at light onto Riverlin St
Go about 2.4 miles then take right on to Lordvale Blvd
Take 2nd left on to Lincoln Lane; intersection at top of the hill (after 4-way stop).
Take a left after entering the new Lincoln Lane section of the complex. Note: there is a left turn before entering the newer section but it is not well marked and goes to the older complex; some people see it, some do not.
My unit is at the right end of the building (when facing it), closest to the new construction, #76.
item.name: AWS August Meeting
